about_the_game:
21 Pirates is a fun multiplayer card game, with the basic gameplay of the popular card game 21, but with unusual bonuses that keep you and your opponent always focused on the game. Raise the stakes, change the conditions of the game in your favor! Do everything to win the treasure!

The rules are very simple

There are 11 cards in the deck; at the beginning of each round, each player is dealt two cards, one of which is hidden from the opponent. You can either take a card or pass your turn. Your goal is to get the card total as close to the target value = 21 as possible, but not more. The player who collected a combination of cards closer to this value wins, however......

Using bonuses radically changes the gameplay

Using a combination of bonuses will turn the situation in your favor. It all depends only on your imagination.


Exchange cards with your opponent


Raise his rate, change the rules. There are a lot of possibilities and combinations.

And at the end a treasure chest awaits you!
